name: MU (JesusAcHe)
description:
An NES Inspired puzzle platformer, submitted for the Ludum Dare 45 Game Jam.

Meet Mugen, the lightest Ninja. He has trained for years to develop his technique of the void, allowing him to create a sphere of emptiness, that can then quickly collapse attracting nearby objects to its center.
Using this ability Mugen must now inflitrate the base of the evil Red Orb clan, and recover what’s his.
 <center></center> KeyboardControllerMovementArrow Keys
D-Pad
JumpSpace Key
B Button
VoidX Key
Y ButtonPauseReturn KeyStart Button

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Sax, Rock, and Roll" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Note: This game is currently on development, and it is super short and incomplete. Follow me on Twitter if you are interested in seeing further development of this project: @AcHeJesus
